data.title: McKendree University Announces President’s and Dean’s List Students
data.text:
McKendree University announces 182 students have been named to its President’s List and 385 students to the Dean’s List for exceptional academic performance during the spring 2013 term. To be named to the President’s List, a student must earn a perfect 4.0 grade point average for the semester. The Dean’s List requires a grade point average of 3.60 or higher.President’s List, Spring 2013 (4.0 grade point average)

McKendree University ranks among the top quarter of regional universities nationwide in the 2013 U.S. News and World Report’s “Best Colleges” edition. It is also a College of Distinction, among “America’s 100 Best College Buys,” and recognized as a “Military Friendly School” by Victory Media for 2013.
